file.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a set of papers, records etc that contain information about a particular person or subject
file.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The FBI keeps files on former White House employees.
We will keep your details on file (=store them for later use).
a copy of the court file
Mendoza read over the file on the murders.
file.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a box or piece of folded card in which you store loose papers
file.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: She pulled a blue file from the shelf.
file.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: information on a computer that you store under a particular name
file.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: a list of all the files and folders on your hard disk
file.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a metal tool with a rough surface that you rub on something to make it smooth
file.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a line of people who are standing or walking one behind the other
file.translation[0].definitions[4].examp: a file of soldiers marching in step
It was dark as we set off in file.
file.translation[0].note_box[0].heading: – Meaning 3: information on a computer that you store under a particular name
file.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: Click on the icon to open the file.
You may need to close the file and restart the computer.
Save the file under a different filename.
I created a file of useful contacts.
I accidentally deleted the wrong file.
You won’t be able to access the file if another user has opened it.
I edited the file and saved it to the hard disk.
To copy a file, save it using a new filename.
He was trying to move  the file from one folder to another.
You can transfer files and share your stuff with friends.
It just takes a few seconds to download the file.
Restart the web browser, and then upload the file.
Double-click on the icon and it will load the zip file onto your computer.
Do you want me to send you the file?
Sorry, I forgot to attach the file.
The program allows you to compress files.
Delete some of the old computer files and create some space on the hard drive.
You can burn your backup file to CD or DVD.
The text file contains hints on how to get the best out of the program.
The bigger the data file, the more time is needed to search it.
This handy utility allows you to change graphics files from one format to another.
file.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily
file.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: I looked to see if anything was filed under my name.
The handbooks are filed away for future reference.
file.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to give or send an official report or news story to your employer
file.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The officer left the scene without filing a report.
file.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: to give a document to a court or other organization so that it can be officially recorded and dealt with
file.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: Mr Genoa filed a formal complaint against the department.
The Morrisons have filed for divorce.
Today is the deadline for Americans to file their tax returns.
file.translation[1].definitions[3].defin: if people file somewhere, they walk there in a line
file.translation[1].definitions[3].examp: We began to file out into the car park.
The mourners filed past the coffin.
file.translation[1].definitions[4].defin: to use a metal or wooden tool to rub something in order to make it smooth
file.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: information about a person or subject that is kept by a company or other organization
file.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: I see from my files that we still have not received payment from you.
A credit reference agency is a company which keeps files on individuals’ debt records.
file.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: if information is kept on file, it is kept so it can be used when it is needed
file.translation[2].definitions[1].examp: We will keep your application on file.
file.translation[2].definitions[2].defin: a box or a cover made of heavy paper or plastic, used to store papers, letters, or documents
file.translation[2].definitions[2].examp: Copies of every letter are kept in a file to record what was agreed.
file.translation[2].definitions[3].defin: a collection of information on a computer that is stored under a particular name
file.translation[2].definitions[3].examp: Be careful not to delete (=remove) any important  files.
You might want to rename the file at a later date.
Save a copy of the file to disk and send it to me.
file.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: to keep or put papers with information on them in a particular place, so that you can find them easily
file.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: The reservation form and confirmation slip are then filed alphabetically.
file.translation[3].definitions[1].defin: to officially send your accounts to the authorities
file.translation[3].definitions[1].examp: You could be prosecuted for failing to file your accounts before February 28.
file.translation[3].definitions[2].defin: to officially record a complaint, law case, official document etc
file.translation[3].definitions[2].examp: Chevron filed a lawsuit to remove Pennzoil as a shareholder.
America’s federal bankruptcy code was rewritten in order to make it easier tofile for bankruptcy (=inform the authorities that a business is bankrupt).
